data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dai, Wu, Cui, Wei, Xiao, Bin, Zhang, Yalin (2010): A new genus and species of Old World Opsiini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae), with a key to genera and species checklist for the tribe. Zootaxa 2607: 55-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197725
